I've used this and 90% of the time it worked flawlessly, occasionally, when connecting a bluetooth keyboard such as the Logitech K810 they would interfere with each other and cause stuttering. Disconnecting and reconnecting the keyboard would usually solve this issue. You can play games and operate the tablet with this though.

context: This product comes with the Wireless Gaming Receiver Xbox? este producto viene con el Receptor de juegos inalámbrico Xbox 360?
response: comes with wireless receiver, controller and driver disk. Worked good on a 32 bit system. I couldn't get to work on a 64 bit system.

context: Does this work on Windows 7/8/8.1?
response: I have played all three games on my current computer which has Windows 7 64 bit and did not have any trouble, except not being able to use a 360 controller. I do not know if it will run on Windows 8/8.1

context: is this game a mmorpg
response: no its just an RPG. But if you're interested in an online RPG there's Elder Scrolls online. You should check it out.

context: will this game work on the regular wii?
response: I am not sure , i know the regular games will work on the wii u , you may want to go to ninetendo page and ask them directly.

context: is it a ok product for kids
response: I would say get a 2DS for kids if under say the age of 10. The 3DS can open and close therefor making it more likely to break if it gets bent too far back when opening.

context: If I paid to download old games on my Wii, can I download them again on the WiiU for free?
response: I don't know but I seen a feature in the settings that allows you to transfer data from Wii to Wii U.

context: How does this thing steer? does it attach to something or does it use an accelerometer? and will it work with most racing games?
response: It uses an accelerometer that maps the rotation axis. It will work with most racing games but you will have to set up the controllers manually on most.  There is a download available that let's the rpm leds work with games that supports them.

context: Will it work with Windows 8?
response: NO PROBLEM! Though on a side note, I have had better luck using the windows update drivers for these things than the provided software. fwiw

context: does this code work on steam   or will splinter cell be stored in a separate game library on amazon.
response: It does not work for Stream, only uPlau. You will have to create an uPlay account if you don't currently have one.

context: does the home button work on this contoller with the PS3? i know it wont turn it on and off but can i still go through the PS menu??
response: Yes the home button work like regluar ps3 controller

context: Does this include a charger?
response: No, it uses AA batteries. It will work with rechargeable batteries though, but you need an external AA charger.

context: it is compatible with ps4 and pc?
response: Yes it is - I use it with my PS4 daily. Just connect the optical connector to the PS4, run the USB to a USB plug (or a USB charger) and you can hear everything. You can then get a separate

context: What does Jewel Quest 3 JC mean? Can I play this game on my PC Windows 7?
response: I don't know what the JC means--but yes, you can play it on your windows 7--that is what I have.

context: Have the bugs been fixed yet?
response: I don't know what bugs you mean. I finished the game without issue. The only bug I found was a random pause menu appearing. I just press the menu button and continue on.

context: Playing the classic games, up to what title can you play? Does it include Sonic & Knuckles?
response: You play through the game experiencing classic levels remade in 2D and 3D platform. But sadly you can't play as knuckles.

response: 4 player on line 2 player off line

context: Why does it have a Teen rating vs. Mature?
response: There is no blood and no body parts coming off

context: Does this work on 3ds games on the 2ds system?
response: Yes, all games that the 2ds can play are compatible with the 3ds, thus it will edit if the game is supported.

context: WIll this work with xbox?
response: I bought it for WII 2 but I have been told it will work with either.  It did work on the WII.

context: Would the Xbox 360 Kinect clip work for the Xbox One Kinect?
response: I dont think so .... The xbox 1 kinect has a different design than the 360 kinect and It clips into the bottom of the xbox 1 kinect

context: Has anyone tried this with Blazblue or Skullgirls? Let me know if it works on those.
response: I know it works with ps3, I havent tried those game specifically, but it works with Marvel vs Capcom 1 and 2.

context: Does this work on Mac?
response: If you are running at least Windows 7 as well on your Mac, than I would say yes. I don't run BootCamp or Windows on my Mac so can't be sure if that's a fact.

context: Do you get two controllers from this order or one?
response: I received two controllers. They were in two separate packages as seen on the picture.

context: Can you play the campaign with two players? Or is it just one..?
response: You can with up to four players simotaneously!

context: Has anyone ever had an issue with the amBX control panel not adding software automatically?
response: Yes, often.  To fix it, I have to restart the service, open the control panel for AMBX in admin mode, restart the game, then quit it once it has reached the main menu.  These are the worst, most buggy and least user friendly drivers I have ever seen.
